reviews.review: I constantly get paired up with children, cheaters and racists. Would highly recommend 10/10!

Super, dar daca nu ai prime dai numai de codati....

me gusta bastante aunque algunas veces hay algunos hakers
its good when you have prime
There's not really to say that's not already been said. The game is what it is.

Disappointed every time i hear a Russian kid at the start of a match but there are plenty of kind and serious players as well.
Playing without prime is worse than not playing at all.
Some players including me will probably never get out of silver but that wont matter as long as you have fun.
Play on third party match making hosts if you want to encounter players who take things seriously as everyone paid for the right to be there.
The community is great and i definitely recommend checking out the custom maps.
